amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for the Achieving a College Education Program at Maricopa Community Colleges.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the Achieving a College Education Program at Maricopa Community College.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A037) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Flake.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A037) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
